description:
All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora’s true intention…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!
Una nobile stirpe - La vera storia di Do Flamingo!
Une famille noble. La véritable identité de Doflamingo !
¡Una familia noble! La verdadera identidad de Doflamingo
気高き一族 ドフラミンゴの正体!
